t: Amazon New-To-Brand Metrics: All The Facts
s: The order will be tagged as new-to-brand if the customer buys the brand’s product on Amazon for the first time in the last 12 months, starting from the present date. The look-back period includes all the purchase activity on Amazon and not just that is ad-driven.
